game.name: CarX Drift Racing Online 2
game.genres: 대규모 멀티플레이어, 레이싱, 시뮬레이션, 스포츠, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 크로스 플랫폼 멀티플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A drifting simulator featuring an authentic competition format and a judging system inspired by modern drift championships. Enhanced and updated physics, developed in collaboration with the CarX Motorsport team.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A drifting simulator featuring an authentic competition format and a judging system inspired by modern drift championships. Enhanced and updated physics, developed in collaboration with the CarX Motorsport team.
